title: The Guardian's Apprentice
description: Keegan Whitestone never knew he was a wizard, but when he gets a message from the grandfather he thought long dead, he must make a choice. He must become his grandfather's apprentice and help him watch over the worlds of science and magic that have been separated from each other for over a thousand years. Together they must seal the ancient portal before the Shadow is unleashed on mankind!
author: J. Michael Radcliffe
